summary: A small mod which adds a few followers to the Riverwood map. Mainly for me and my friends, but you can install it too if you want.
descriptionHtml:
A small mod which adds a few lore friendly followers to the Riverwood map. Mainly for me and my friends, but you can install it too if you want. 

Includes four followers:

Therren Duvan: A one handed combat Ranger, Light armour. Dunmer.
Keflar: A dagger wielding Rogue, Light Armour. Khajiit.
Irrius (Real name Barag Sho Marog): A heavy, hammer wielder, Heavy Armour. Orc.
Fallon: An Archer. Light Armour. Bosmer.
author: Alex Somerville
